Sentencas: A renewable energy multi-generation system based on proton exchange membrane fuel cell (PEMFC) and solar energy is proposed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic study of a hybrid PEMFC-solar energy multi-generation system combined with SOEC and dual Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The hybrid system is mainly composed of PEMFC, solar dish collector (SDC), solid oxide electrolyzer cell (SOEC) and dual Rankine cycle (DRC), which can provide electricity, heat, hydrogen and hot water.
Titulo: Thermodynamic study of a hybrid PEMFC-solar energy multi-generation system combined with SOEC and dual Rankine cycle

Sentencas: Considering the solar radiation variation throughout the day, the proposed system is operated in three modes, namely, Solar-PEMFC mode, Solar-SOEC mode and PEMFC mode.
Titulo: Thermodynamic study of a hybrid PEMFC-solar energy multi-generation system combined with SOEC and dual Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The mathematical models of each subsystem are developed, and their energy and exergy efficiency are estimated using thermodynamic laws.
Titulo: Thermodynamic study of a hybrid PEMFC-solar energy multi-generation system combined with SOEC and dual Rankine cycle

Sentencas: Moreover, the effects of key operating parameters (e.g.: current density, operating temperature, solar radiation and ambient temperature) on system performance are analyzed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic study of a hybrid PEMFC-solar energy multi-generation system combined with SOEC and dual Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The results show that high solar radiation and low operating temperature are beneficial to improve system efficiency, high current density can enhance electrolysis efficiency.
Titulo: Thermodynamic study of a hybrid PEMFC-solar energy multi-generation system combined with SOEC and dual Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The energy efficiency in three modes is 37%, 67% and 82%, respectively, and the electrolysis efficiency can reach 76%.
Titulo: Thermodynamic study of a hybrid PEMFC-solar energy multi-generation system combined with SOEC and dual Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The maximum exergy destruction occurs on solar collector and PEMFC.
Titulo: Thermodynamic study of a hybrid PEMFC-solar energy multi-generation system combined with SOEC and dual Rankine cycle
